objects.text:
• 50MP Pro-Grade Camera
• 8K Video Recording
• Powerful Galaxy AI
• Unlocked, 256GB Storage

product_details.description: Plus-up your day with Galaxy AI on Galaxy S24+. Wonder where your favorite influencer got their shoes? Simply Circle to Search* with Google to see where you can buy your own pair. Then snap a photo to show off your new kicks and elevate your pic from good to great on Galaxy S24+.  Before you head out in style, call up that new authentic Japanese restaurant to make a reservation and impress the staff as you use Live Translate* to speak their language in real time. And with our most powerful processor yet, you can smoothly switch between texting friends, taking photos of your food and searching for your next culinary adventure.  With Galaxy AI on GalaxyS24+, life just got a whole lot easier —and a lot more fun. Epic, just like that.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern mobile phone promotional design with a clean and professional aesthetic. The background features soft abstract gradients and translucent circular shapes that add subtle depth without distracting from the main content. The heading layer (`heading`) is bold and dark blue, while the subheading (`subheading`) uses a vibrant blue to emphasize premium quality. The feature list (`description`) neatly summarizes the device’s key specs in a compact format. The price tag (`price`) stands out in a bold, oversized font, complemented by a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with a matching blue fill and white text (`cta`). The banner also includes a prominently positioned product image (`product_image`) that overlaps neatly with the text for visual balance.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Base: #F2F2F7  
- Accent Gray: #E2E2E7  
- Primary Text: #1B1D52  
- Secondary Blue: #4B5EFC  
- Price Text: #1B1D52  
- Button Fill: #4B5EFC  
- Button Text: #FFFFFF  
- Description Text: #333333
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and minimalistic Samsung smartphone in a smooth silver-white finish. The dominant color palette consists of soft silver (#D9D9D9), classic white (#FFFFFF), deep black (#000000), and subtle champagne gold-yellow accents (#F5E996) within the screen’s abstract background. The neutral silver body blends elegantly with the display's muted tones, giving a premium and futuristic feel. The pre-highlighted sparkles and soft gradients transition smoothly between light gray (#BFBFBF) and yellow, creating a subtle glow. For an advertisement banner, combining these colors with high-contrast black text or icons can enhance product clarity while maintaining a luxurious aesthetic.
